trans-unit.source: Configures the global cache settings for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 配置 ASP.NET 应用程序的全局缓存设置。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `<cache>` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: CacheSection 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改`<cache>`配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET caching feature is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 缓存功能实现的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>类。</xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Caching](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Caching](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The CacheSection can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> CacheSection 可将信息写入到根据定义的部分属性，<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其值为<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition></xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>的限制的配置文件的相关部分

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser.
trans-unit.target: 在层次结构不允许层次结构中的配置文件中写入任何尝试会对由分析器生成的错误消息中。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此类可用于读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。

trans-unit.source: A cache is an application-specific hash table used to store frequently accessed data.
trans-unit.target: 缓存是一个用于存储经常访问的数据的特定于应用程序的哈希表。

trans-unit.source: Application and session state are similar to the cache, the application state being the most similar, due to its application-wide scope.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序和会话状态是类似于缓存中，正在非常类似，由于其应用程序范围的应用程序状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the biggest differences between the cache and the application-state mechanism is that the cache supports dependencies These dependencies make it possible to build applications that automatically remove cached items when certain events occur.
trans-unit.target: 缓存和应用程序状态机制之间的最大差异之一是缓存支持这种依赖性，使得可以在生成应用程序发生某些事件时，会自动删除缓存的项的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: CacheSection 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>类通过<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache expiration is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁用缓存过期时间。

trans-unit.source: If the DisableExpiration property is set to `true`, the cached items never expire.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DisableExpiration 属性设置为`true`，永不过期的缓存的项。

trans-unit.source: This setting is intended to help debug cache behavior in application code.
trans-unit.target: 此设置被为了帮助调试应用程序代码中的缓存行为。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when disabling cache expiration, as this might result in items being cached longer than they are valid.
trans-unit.target: 时要格外小心禁用缓存过期时间，因为这可能会导致项目缓存的时间超过它们是有效的。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To add a page to the output cache, you must establish an expiration policy for that page.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要添加到输出缓存的页，必须建立该页面的过期策略。

trans-unit.source: You can do this declaratively with the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or programmatically using the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以执行此操作以声明方式与[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令或以编程方式使用<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Set Expiration Values for ASP.NET Page Caching](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 为 ASP.NET 页面缓存设置过期值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cache expiration is disabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果禁用了缓存过期时间;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache memory collection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁用缓存内存集合。

trans-unit.source: If the DisableMemoryCollection property is set to `true`, calls to the cache-related API will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DisableMemoryCollection 属性设置为`true`，对缓存相关 API 的调用将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: If the DisableMemoryCollection property is set to `true`, the cache does not attempt to collect unused items.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DisableMemoryCollection 属性设置为`true`，缓存不会尝试收集未使用的项。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using this setting, as disabling memory collection can quickly lead to Out of Memory conditions for the application.
trans-unit.target: 请小心使用此设置，因为禁用内存集合快速将导致应用程序的内存不足条件。

trans-unit.source: This setting has no effect on the ASP.NET internal cache or on the output cache.
trans-unit.target: 此设置不起 ASP.NET 内部缓存在或上输出缓存。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different types of cache, see [Caching](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关不同类型的缓存的详细信息，请参阅[Caching](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cache memory collection is disabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果缓存内存集合处于禁用状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum percentage of virtual memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值虚拟内存使用情况的最大百分比。

trans-unit.source: The PercentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit property specifies the threshold for high pressure conditions.
trans-unit.target: PercentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit 属性指定高压力条件的阈值。

trans-unit.source: As this threshold is approached, the cache system gradually begins more aggressive scavenging measures.
trans-unit.target: 如在达到此阈值，则缓存系统逐渐开始更积极的清理措施。

trans-unit.source: The maximum percentage of virtual memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟内存使用率的最大百分比。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 90%.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 90%。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum size of the working-process private space.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值的工作进程专用空间的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The PrivateBytesLimit property specifies the threshold for high pressure conditions.
trans-unit.target: PrivateBytesLimit 属性指定高压力条件的阈值。

trans-unit.source: As this threshold is approached, the cache system gradually begins more aggressive scavenging measures.
trans-unit.target: 如在达到此阈值，则缓存系统逐渐开始更积极的清理措施。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number, in bytes, of the private space allocated to the working process.
trans-unit.target: 为工作进程分配的专用空间最大数目，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval between polling for the worker-process memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值的工作进程内存使用量的轮询时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: This polling is expensive and might need to be adjusted as a tradeoff between reaction speed of the cache-trimming algorithm and number of polling calls made.
trans-unit.target: 此轮询很高，可能需要进行调整，缓存修整算法的反应速度和轮询作出的调用数之间的权衡。

trans-unit.source: The time interval between polling for the worker process memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 辅助进程内存使用量的轮询之间的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 2 分钟。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
